snippet: The Federal Trade Commission announced a multinational push against schemes that deceive owners into allowing access to their PCs.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission announces multinational crackdown on so-called tech support scams that deceive owners into allowing access to their PCs; commission names 17 individuals and 14 companies, mostly in India, as participants in the operations.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission announced a multinational push against schemes that deceive owners into allowing access to their PCs.

headline.seo: F.T.C. Crackdown Aims At Tech Support Scams
headline.main: Multinational Crackdown on Computer Con Artists
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Crackdown Aims At Tech Support Fraud
